item.description:
Before we head over to the Cadillac Ranch Friday night we will be eating dinner literally right next door to welcome any of our new members to our group. The place we're attending is a pizzeria but they have excellent sea food along with a lot of other things. If anyone wants to only eat dinner and not go to the ranch with us then by all means join us for dinner. Mack's on West is one of the places Christian and I regularly go to because they have excellent food and a great atomosphere.

 

Looking forward to seeing all of you there and then heading over to the ranch!

Cheers,

John
item.name: Dinner: Welcome To All Our New Members at Mack's on West in Southington
